Equity
======

In this part, you can get all stocks information like price or volumn, balance sheet and so on.
Those are done by typing some commands, like

.. code-block:: python

   051957 KS Equity


1. Research & Analysis
----------------------

In 2 page, go `here
<http://guides.library.yale.edu/ld.php?content_id=11942105>`_.

**MARKET SURVEILLANCE**

+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| Function | Explanation                               | 
+==========+===========================================+
| **WEI**  | World Equity Indices                      | 
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **WEIF** | World Equity Indices Futures              |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **WB**   | World Bond Markets                        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **IMOV** | Equity Index/Industry Group Movers        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+ 
| **IMAP** | Price Movements Across Industries         |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **MOST** | Most Active Stocks                        | 
+----------+-------------------------------------------+


**ECONOMICS**

+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| Function | Explanation                               | 
+==========+===========================================+
| **ECO**  | Economic Calendars                        | 
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **WECO** | World Economic Calendars                  |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **ECWB** | Economic Workbench                        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **ECFC** | Economic Forecasts                        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+ 
| **ECST** | World Economic Statistics                 |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+



2. Technical Analysis
---------------------

In 2 page, go `here
<http://guides.library.yale.edu/ld.php?content_id=11942102>`__.

**MARKET SURVEILLANCE**

+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| Function | Explanation                               | 
+==========+===========================================+
| **WEI**  | World Equity Indices                      | 
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **WEIF** | World Equity Indices Futures              |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **WB**   | World Bond Markets                        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **IMOV** | Equity Index/Industry Group Movers        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+ 
| **IMAP** | Price Movements Across Industries         |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **MOST** | Most Active Stocks                        | 
+----------+-------------------------------------------+


**ECONOMICS**

+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| Function | Explanation                               | 
+==========+===========================================+
| **ECO**  | Economic Calendars                        | 
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **WECO** | World Economic Calendars                  |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **ECWB** | Economic Workbench                        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **ECFC** | Economic Forecasts                        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+ 
| **ECST** | World Economic Statistics                 |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+



3. Portfolio Manager
--------------------

In 2 page, go `here
<http://guides.library.yale.edu/ld.php?content_id=11942105>`__.

**MARKET SURVEILLANCE**

+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| Function | Explanation                               | 
+==========+===========================================+
| **WEI**  | World Equity Indices                      | 
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **WEIF** | World Equity Indices Futures              |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **WB**   | World Bond Markets                        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **IMOV** | Equity Index/Industry Group Movers        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+ 
| **IMAP** | Price Movements Across Industries         |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **MOST** | Most Active Stocks                        | 
+----------+-------------------------------------------+


**ECONOMICS**

+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| Function | Explanation                               | 
+==========+===========================================+
| **ECO**  | Economic Calendars                        | 
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **WECO** | World Economic Calendars                  |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **ECWB** | Economic Workbench                        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
| **ECFC** | Economic Forecasts                        |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+ 
| **ECST** | World Economic Statistics                 |
+----------+-------------------------------------------+
